titles: A second letter to Father Lewis Sabran, Jesuite in answer to his reply.
author: Gee, Edward, 1657-1730.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, new York.
Attributed to Edward Gee. cf. NUC pre-1956.
keywords: Sabran, Lewis, 1652-1732. --  Reply of Lewis Sabran of the Society of Jesus to the answer given to his letter written to a peer of the Church of England by a nameless member of the same.
